fuels moduleÂ¶

The fuels module is a collection of classes that deal with forest fuel calculations.

Fvsfuels
Uses FVS and an input inventory to calculate canopy fuels at the individual tree level
Inventory
Methods for converting inventory data to FVS tree list format

Contens:

    • set_keyword
